workflows.name: automatePrePostProductionTasks
workflows.description: Automates pre and post-production tasks using AI, based on a script summary and film genre.

task.description: The pre or post-production task to automate (e.g., 'Generate a shot list', 'Create a call sheet').

scriptSummary.description: A summary of the film script.

details.description: Generated details for the specified pre or post-production task.

workflows.name: analyzeTicketSalesData
workflows.description: Analyzes ticket sales data to predict movie collection trends and suggest distribution strategies.

ticketSalesData.description: Ticket sales data from BookMyShow. Should be in CSV format with headers: 'Date', 'Region', 'ScreenCount', and 'Sales'.

predictedTrends.description: A detailed analysis of the ticket sales data, including predicted movie collection trends and actionable insights for distribution strategies.

workflows.prompt:
You are an expert data analyst specializing in the film industry.

You will analyze the ticket sales data to predict movie collection trends and provide actionable insights for distribution strategies.

Analyze the following ticket sales data and provide a detailed report:

Ticket Sales Data:
{{ticketSalesData}}

Based on this data, predict the movie collection trends and suggest optimal distribution strategies. Identify key patterns, potential risks, and opportunities.

Your analysis should be clear, concise, and actionable for a film distributor.

workflows.name: ensureLegalCompliance
workflows.description: Analyzes a contract for legal compliance and uses a placeholder for DocuSign integration.

contractText.description: The text content of the contract.

docusignTemplateId.description: The ID of the DocuSign template to use.

signerName.description: The name of the contract signer.

signerEmail.description: The email of the contract signer.

docusignEnvelopeId.description: The ID of the DocuSign envelope created (placeholder).

workflows.name: generateLocationContract
workflows.description: Generates a location contract for film productions based on provided details.

locationAddress.description: The full address of the location.

ownerName.description: The name of the location owner.

ownerContact.description: The contact information of the location owner (phone/email).

filmCompanyName.description: The name of the film production company.

productionDates.description: The start and end dates of the filming production.

specificTerms.description: Any specific terms or conditions for the location usage.
